channel.title: admin on Harish Guda
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Harish Guda

item.description: I am a PhD student in Management Science at the University of Texas at Dallas. My advisors are Milind Dawande and Ganesh Janakiraman. My broad interests are in understanding emerging business models. I am also interested in retail operations and pricing and revenue management. My academic training/coursework are in the areas of Optimization, Game Theory and Information Economics, Statistics, Econometrics and Machine Learning.
